Reviews.Title: DEAD AFTER A MONTH
Reviews.Author: James Leatherwood
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for an exercise room, so it was used for about 2-3 hours, 5 days a week for about a month before it wouldn't power up. While the seller stated that this was a “NEW” TV, the box it came in was not only clearly labeled “REFURBISHED”, but it had at least 2 previous shipping addresses on it. When this TV did work, the picture was OK, but the audio was truly horrible – piercing highs with no lower mids or bass to speak of. The sound was so painful, my wife refused to use it. Since it was only used in a cursory capacity during my workouts, I figured that I could deal with the s***ty audio and the fact that it was a refurb. As stated, after just over a month of use it wouldn't power up. Of course, the TV died after the seller's return window, and I am currently waiting for a possible replacement from the manufacturer. (and another $26 lost on shipping). We'll see if the replacement is any better … provided I actually get it. Do yourself a favor, buy a Samsung, LG, Toshiba, or something  known to be reliable from a known/reputable seller – even it it costs substantially more. You may save yourself some considerable aggravation.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV!
Reviews.Author: Isaac T. Spencer
Reviews.Content: So I was a bit hesitant in buying this tv at first, because It was not a well known brand. However it is quite the tv that comes with a warranty! For the price it is definitely worth the purchase and is one of the easiest to set up that I have come across so far. If your looking for a tv and not wanting to pay 500+ for it I STRONGLY recommend this one if you want something nice but are on a tighter budget. The only beef I really have with the tv is that the speakers could be a bit better, not that they are that bad but it would pry be  a good idea to get some speakers to hook to it in the future.

ProductInfo.Features:
The Seiki 24-inch LED TV set SE 241TS features a slim, compact look with an excellent picture.
Height, including the sturdy stand, is only 15.5 inches
HD 1080p resolution makes images literally pop off the screen.
The screen-refresh rate is a speedy 60HZ
A 1000:1 dynamic contrast ratio keeps images crisp
ProductInfo.Name: Seiki 24'' CLASS - SE-241TS - 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV
